name: Star Gaze - quilt pattern - pdf file
description:
This is a listing for Star Gaze quilt pattern - pdf file. The design is for confident beginners with experience in rotary cutting and straight line sewing.

Fabric requirements, cutting instructions and block assembly are all explained in detail.

The Star Gaze is pieced with 2 different blocks and is based on traditional quilt blocks and techniques. Both blocks are pieced using half-square triangle (HST) units - the tutorial how to make HST is included in this pattern. Easy to follow instructions with assembly diagrams for both Star and Cross Blocks.

Finished quilt size is 53" x 82"

Find and choose your own favorite colors and fabrics for this quilt and get the sewing machine rocking!

name: Fire & Ice - quilt pattern - pdf file
description:
This is a listing for Fire & Ice quilt pattern - pdf file. The design is for confident beginners with experience in rotary cutting a straight line sewing.

Fabric requirements, cutting instructions and block assembly are all explained in detail.

The Fire & Ice is pieced with 2 different log cabin blocks and is based on traditional quilt blocks and techniques. A tutorial how to make log cabin blocks is included in this pattern. Easy to follow instructions with assembly diagrams for both Fire and Ice Blocks.

Finished quilt size is 60" x 84"

Find and choose your own favorite colors and fabrics for this quilt and get the sewing machine rocking!

name: Luxor Throw - quilt pattern - pdf file
description:
This is a listing for Luxor Throw quilt pattern - pdf file. The design is for confident beginners with experience in rotary cutting and straight line sewing.

Fabric requirements, cutting instructions and block assembly are all explained in detail.

This quilt is assembled with a total of 42 chevron log cabin blocks - 21 in red hues and 21 in blue hues. These traditional blocks can also be used to make a nice modern quilt design.

Finished quilt size is 60" x 70"

Find your own favorite colors and fabrics for this quilt and get the sewing machine rocking!
